title: Fall from Grace
description: A classic Jill Barnett love and laughter novella set in the Highlands of Scotland, where a clan war has left the Clan McNish poor and starving. As granddaughter to the clan chieftain, Grace McNish decides to capture and ransom a vile McNab. But she and her band of misfits capture the wrong man, Colin Campbell, Earl of Argyll and Lord of the Isles, a man who has come to must decide their clan's fate. From Once Upon A Bride and Season in the Highlands Highland Fling anthologiesFor readeers of Julie Garwood and Jude Deveraux.
author: Jill Barnett
